text: Saint-Gobain is a French company in construction materials production and retail, glass, ceramics, plastics, abrasives. Created in 1665, its headquarters are in La Défense.La Défense : clap de fin pour la tour Saint- Gobain The company is listed on CAC 40 index.SAINT-GOBAIN == References == Category:17th-century establishments in France Category:1660s establishments in Europe Category:1665 establishments Category:Manufacturing companies of France
title: Saint-Gobain
